title: Fibonacci Calculator API
description: A simple web API that calculates Fibonacci numbers efficiently. The service should handle large numbers and provide both iterative and recursive implementations.
target_user: Developers who need a reliable Fibonacci calculation service for testing, education, or integration into larger applications.
requirements: Endpoint /fib/{n} returns the nth Fibonacci number
Endpoint /fib/batch accepts array of numbers and returns all results
Handle errors gracefully (negative numbers, overflow, etc.)
must_have_features: Calculate Fibonacci numbers up to n=1000
Support both GET and POST requests
Include timing information for performance analysis
Provide both iterative and recursive calculation methods
technical_details:
Stack: Python, FastAPI
Database: None required (stateless service)
Performance: Response time < 100ms for n <= 100
